## Development and Physiology Lab (BIOL216L: Fall 2022)

Experiment based laboratory class to understand the complex interactions governing the basic physiology and development of organisms. 

**Role:** Instructor and Grader for a section

## Gene, Ecology and Evolution Lab (BIOL214L: Spring 2023, Fall 2023)

Experiment based laboratory class focusing on biological molecules (with a focus on DNA and RNA); basics of cell structure; molecular genetics; biotechnology; population genetics and evolution; ecology.

**Role:** Instructor and Grader for a section
